member.name: T:ContentProvider.Errors
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.CannotAssignInternalContentSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot assign the internal content set property..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.InvalidBaseDirectory
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify a valid base directory..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.InvalidFileExtension
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify a valid file extension..

member.name: P:ContentProvider.Errors.InvalidRootNamespace
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify a valid root namespace for the embedded resources..
